title: Tomato, Apricot, and Feta Salad With Mint Recipe
full_text:
Tomato, Apricot, and Feta Salad With Mint Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
pound
ripe
tomatoes
(a mix of several varieties), cut into bite-size chunks
2 to 3
apricots
, pitted and sliced
Small handful torn fresh
mint leaves
Kosher salt
and freshly ground black pepper
Extra virgin olive oil
, for drizzling
6
ounces
feta cheese
, broken into rough chunks
Directions
Combine tomatoes, apricots, and half of mint in a large bowl and season with salt and pepper. Drizzle with olive oil and toss very gently to coat. Arrange on a serving platter. Add chunks of feta cheese. Sprinkle with remaining mint. Drizzle with more olive oil. Serve.
Notes
Use only the absolute ripest in-season tomatoes and apricots for this recipe.
